ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] My account
ygData.msgSnippet: *chuckle* Ironic isn t it... I have been playing a little more... been away for about a year, and a friend explained to me that ebayed toons abound.  She
ygData.messageBody:
*chuckle*

Ironic isn't it...

I have been playing a little more... been away for about a year, and a
friend explained to me that "ebayed toons" abound. She said, It gets a
little ridiculous when a stripped level 70 wizzy asks you were Qeynos
is. ROFL. Wow, now that's a lil bit sad.

Supposedly when the last mass exodus came about, during the release of
World of Warcraft , Lineage 2 and Everquest 2 among other games, the
availability of "previously owned accounts" skyrocketed.... supply and
demand anyone?

I guess Sony saw that if you can't beat them, join them....... It's a
strange strange virtual world /chuckle.

Paria of the Tribunal

From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com] On

Sent: Tuesday, May 31, 2005 3:44 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] My account

well that is, unless SOE gets their % percentage

pment&month=current


Hehehe
